website_summaries.verdict: A versatile handheld steamer for a decent price that gets the job done.
pros: Can use continuous steam or bursts of steam
cons: You must use distilled water in this unit

customer_reviews.title: Fast and works great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this steamer, it's fast and works really well. The attachments work well but just be careful because with the attachments it collects water and sometimes drips and can burn you. But for how well it works it's worth it. ****ALSO with water in this does make a clicking sound when pulling the trigger but it is normal for this steamer. It's not broken
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Impressive and easy to use. Heats up so fast! I brought this with me during my one month vacation to Europe. It’s worth it and made my clothes to look good and not wrinkled. I just hope it was a bit smaller otherwise, it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Imardr

customer_reviews.title: and easy to refill
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. This unit is really simple to use, quick to heat up, and easy to refill. Sometimes when using the delicates filter the water will pool at the bottom then spill out so I have a towel handy to wipe it down. I have named it "Prince Robot IV" in honor of my favorite graphic novel (but I digress).
customer_reviews.author: macaroni

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job but leaks when not in use.
customer_reviews.text: Leaks. Badly. It worked perfectly for the first week, so I threw out the box & thought I'd found a winner. But then it started leaking everywhere when not in use. It doesn't leak onto my clothes when in use -which is a plus. If you get one that doesn't leak, I can tell you that the steamer does its job -it's a STEAMER, not an iron. It's not going to press your garment.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING I hate ironing. This is so convenient I can iron a shirt last minute and run out the door. The price is very inexpensive. I even steamed a couple of outfits ahead of time and usually I just avoid picking out the wrinkled clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!!
customer_reviews.text: Extra long cord. Only takes a few minutes to heat up. Reservoir is a good size where the water doesn’t run out in one use. Weight isn’t extremely light but not as heavy as an iron. It is a good size where it can be used as a travel steamer or for at home daily use( I bought it to steam my outfit in the morning). Does leave some water spots as most steamers do. But as the manual says just wait a few moments and then continue use which worked for me. READ THE USER MANUAL!!! Don’t be the person leaving stupid reviews. Haha
customer_reviews.author: Jwpocoboone

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and it is dangerous. It spills hot water on being used continuously. It can burn you. Its so heavy you cannot iron more than 2 clothes at a stretch. Unfortunately I fell for the brand name and trusted it completely. Did not use immediately and could not return. It is insanely over priced for the quality. Do yourself a favor and buy the $20 smaller hand held steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little invention
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids Godmother. She's a registered nurse and always running. She was always complaining about how her scrubs were so wrinkled she was having to iron them which took a very long time. So I bought her this. She said it's AMAZING. It works perfectly, easy to use, and its light weight She said it's the best present she ever got besides my kids. Works great, quick, doesn't burn her hands and is just one of the best inventions ever.
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Steam it Up
customer_reviews.text: The streamer is very hot, do not place the fingers over the hole were the steam come out. Just stream a curtain. Had no need of removing the curtains to iron it, just steam it and wrinkles are gone. Did a t-shirt, the result was like a iron t-shirt. The Black + Decker steamer do it's job and is a quick way of pressing ones clothes and other things that a steamer can clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rogers

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and decided on this one. This works fantastic it got the wrinkles out of my curtains and tablecloth. I still have more curry to do. I absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.author: DSB

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without this?
customer_reviews.text: After my cheap steamer wand broke, I decided to upgrade to this bad boy. I don’t know how I lived without this for so long. I love that it has an automatic shutoff feature so I never have to stress about leaving it on. The long cord is also nice. It heats up quickly and has a good size water chamber.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I used to love ironing and then one day I didn’t. I had about a years worth of clothes that I refused to iron so I thought I’d try this. Works great! It also heats up very quickly. All my wrinkled clothes were in much better shape after I used this for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Shariike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and I am pleased to report that the recipient is very happy with the product! I also purchased garment steamer gloves which protect the hands from the hot steam from this garment steamer. According to the recipient, the steamer works great and provides hot steam for attacking those wrinkles from suits, etc.Going to purchase one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: My mom even loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I hate ironing and manage to be awful at it too. And some things ya can’t iron easily, like curtains. Well, I’ve used this on both clothes and curtains and haven’t had any issue. It works great and my mom borrowed it, loved it - guess what she’s getting for Christmas. Currently wrapped under the Christmas tree!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work upon first use.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this purchase due to the fact that it did not work from the get go. The steamer makes a continuous clicking sound when I press my finger down on the trigger and no steam comes out. I made sure to follow the directions, I even asked other family members to give it a try just to be sure that I was not the only one that wasn't able to get it to work. No luck! After numerous attempts, the steamer continued to make the clicking sound and no steam was ever emitted. Very frustrating and disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Uniform Must!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t ironed a Navy uniform since purchasing this! Wrinkles fall right out! Great product good price
customer_reviews.author: L. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work; no response from Black & Decker or Amazon Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: The product does not work - it just makes a loud clicking noise and doesn't emit any steam. I now see that other reviewers have had that same experience. I sent a message to Black & Decker and to Amazon Customer Support on December 30. It is now January 16 and - except for an immediate automated message from Black & Decker - I have not had a response from either company. I've just written again. Overall an extremely disappointing experience. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Clicks and no steam
customer_reviews.text: Just opened and tried it to no avail. It makes a loud clicking sound and nothing come out. Followed directions. Seems to be the same trouble that other one star reviews have.
customer_reviews.author: A. Freas

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as discontinued Shark
customer_reviews.text: This does not have a burst of steam, an drips water on clothes even with cloth shield attached. Has a nice long cord making easy to reach all areas to be steamed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled but need to get work done/Update RETURNED
customer_reviews.text: Has to be held so close to have any effect (& for so long) you'll scald yourself with hot steam. Liked the extra long cord. Can't find a decent steamer to replace my Euroflex Monster so settled for this since I need to have something. Update: not even a month had passed from date of purchase when the steamer just quit working altogether. Returned it, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: Scam. Broken, used steamer.
customer_reviews.text: The steamer and the attachments were removed from the clear shipping bags, which were stuffed into the bottom of the box. The manual is also missing. I didn’t chose the open box option and expected a new, working item with instructions. This one was apparently does not work and they just keep sending it out hoping someone won’t return it. The steamer doesn’t make any steam, trigger burst or regular.
customer_reviews.author: Mtjme

customer_reviews.title: Friendly seller
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received did not work. I processed the return item and the seller had already ordered the replacement for me. Second steamer worked perfectly and as designed.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Quintana

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Hello ALL, This Is the very BEST handheld steamer, please, please BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Logan

customer_reviews.title: I really like this steamer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this steamer!!! I have had other products and they leak water all over garments. I would like to find steamer water that smells good.
customer_reviews.author: KWLolly

customer_reviews.title: Leaks a little...
customer_reviews.text: I’ll keep it, it’s fine but it leaks sometimes esp. if the water is low. Kinda wish I went w the other brand I was considering.
customer_reviews.author: iliana quander

customer_reviews.title: It is very effective. However the water container is ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very effective. However the water container is built in a way that it is nearly impossible to get all the water out. I am in constant fear of mold or a musky smell developing. They need to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Mata

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after three uses.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first few times. A bit larger than anticipated, and gets exhausting to use for longer than a few minutes. All that is irrelevant as it stopped producing steam for me after three uses. I figure I spent about $15 for each garment I managed to steam.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lindemann

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It actually works. Does a good job, but I wish it had more attachments compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Arnaldo T. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: A step up!
customer_reviews.text: Still sputters like most Steamers but holds a lot of water and a step up from my joy Steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan DePugh

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and I missed my window to return it!
customer_reviews.text: Hate this thing, but can't return it. Waste of money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: WBMommy

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CHOICE
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice. Many improvements over earlier steamers: automatic shut-off, larger water tank for longer use between fills, push-button steaming (instead of constant steaming, which causes steam vents to plug up). The plate where steam exits is odd, in that it's not smooth; sometimes causes fabric to cling to it. Otherwise, all good. Now that I've had this steamer for a year, I'm revising my rating to 5-stars. It still works as well as ever, and I use it almost every day. I leave it plugged in, as it turns off automatically. No problems. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works well, removes all wrinkles. Just leaks a bit of water on the shirt, so I recommend you don’t use this product last-minute. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matthijs

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my college-age son. He really likes it and says it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Walls

customer_reviews.title: Kids use it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has some useful attachments that came with it. even the kids use it for their clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Delbert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should have one of these. It should be everyone's christmas list.
customer_reviews.author: Skype29

customer_reviews.title: Not all parts included
customer_reviews.text: No good, it did not include the three attachment frames. Now I have to go through the trouble of returning the item, frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: juanita acosta

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Smooths All Wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: Wrinkles disappear. It heats up quickly. The long cord is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: The power cord is nice and long which is nice
customer_reviews.text: Heats up VERY quickly. The power cord is nice and long which is nice. Feels well made. Works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: James Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It is spitting and dripping hot water down the handle. Dangerous and not safe to use. Burning smell from steam outlet
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN KEOGH

customer_reviews.title: Great Steamer, No Drips!
customer_reviews.text: Got for my wife because she hates ironing, haha. She loves it and uses it multiple times a week. Does not leak water like other steamers we have tried in the past. It also hold a good amount a water so you can do multiple garments in one run. It is a lot bigger than other steamers on Amazon which for us is a benefit becuase it's easier to use (comfortable in hand). Would highly recommend giving one a try!
customer_reviews.author: Kenton

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: The steamer works very good. I am a clothing resaler on eBay and this really helps the presentation for the pictures that I take. lightweight and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Roy E. Watford

customer_reviews.title: Steams away the wrinkles!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of my wedding gifts for a friend. She used it and said it did the job of unwrinkling her clothes just as it said it would. She seemed very pleased with the results she got with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but. I would not recommend You shoulder will ...
customer_reviews.text: Good but. I would not recommend You shoulder will start hurting after 5 mints because you are holding water tank and steamer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon2020

customer_reviews.title: Quite a steamer
customer_reviews.text: I have had other steamers but never one that works as well as this one! No sputtering, continuous steam, and more control. It is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: A Powerful Steamer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this steamer to remove the wrinkles from a large (7' x10') photo backdrop. It performed flawlessly. I had to fill the reservoir twice to complete the large job. I have since used it to remove some wrinkles from the back of a suit coat. It warms up quickly, is easy to use, and does the job! Much easier than getting out the iron and ironing board! I look forward to using it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: when it works it works fine. ample steam and working time
customer_reviews.text: when it works it works fine. ample steam and working time. only issue and its a significant issue is the power button doesn't always work and I'm not sure why it is intermittent but obviously if it doesn't power up its just a paper weight. fortunately sitting in a hotel room affords a lot of idle time and I just kept pushing the button and eventually it would work. still considering sending it back for a refund not an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: V.Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Easy, portable for trips, basically perfect
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is it’s a little heavy so I need to switch arms if I’m steaming a few items at a time. One thing I love is you can lock the button so at least your hand doesn’t get tired of clenching the trigger. Don’t go cheap on an item like this. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: WeBeBoppin

customer_reviews.title: Did not prime ... bummer.
customer_reviews.text: Warmed water as instruction directed. Held trigger and waited for steam. No steam. Waste of money. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: SillyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a little over a year ago, and already it doesn’t work! I barely used it! Maybe 3 or 4 times. I wouldn’t buy this. It’s no more dependable than the cheap ones. Stay away. It’s junk.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: clicks loudly, no steam
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. Right out of the box it doesn't work. When I press the button to prime the water pump, there's a loud continuous clicking noise. The unit gets quite hot but there is no steam, even after about 4 minutes of holding the button down and listening to the clicking. I was pleased to find this model because of the automatic shutoff feature. Now I'm past the return window so I'm irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: recommended by a bridal shop to purchase for last min wedding dress wrinkles. Worked well & was used by all my bridesmaids as well!
customer_reviews.author: Anna B

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work. Tried all the troubleshooting. It heats up but no steam emits. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoShopper

customer_reviews.title: Plugged this steamer in and almost instantly it worked great.!
customer_reviews.text: Plugged this steamer in and almost instantly it worked great. ! ! ! I love it. I had ordered a different steamer before and sent it back. This is definately worth owning.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Sara

customer_reviews.title: Ironing is much easier.
customer_reviews.text: This product is heavy and difficult to use. The pad keeps rolling off the holder and it is frustrating because you have to let it cool before you can re-attach it.
customer_reviews.author: @dawgwriter

customer_reviews.title: Works, but at its own speed
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but takes me around 15 minutes to do a B-level wrinkle removal on my cotton shirts. Unsurprisingly, appears be a quality build.
customer_reviews.author: Smork

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Lots of steam. Love the long cord.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Sherrill Stutts

customer_reviews.title: Good for garments
customer_reviews.text: Good for lightweight garments. Nothing else. Tried in several pairs of pants, polos, etc. Nothing. It works on small light weight fabrics only.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it - performance is lame and it runs out of water in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Chaveco

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER Advanced Handheld Garment / Fabric Steamer with 3 Attachments, Gray/Blue, HGS200
product_meta.description:
Erasing wrinkles from clothing and freshening up fabrics is a breeze with the BLACK+DECKER Advanced Handheld Steamer. With 1400 watts of power and a preheat time of less than a minute, this steamer delivers quick and effective wrinkle-fighting performance, producing 45% more steam than the Conair GS23 Series*. The locking trigger lets you apply steam continuously or in small bursts, plus three attachments are included for removing lint, and steaming upholstery and delicate fabrics. So handy to use, it’s perfect for deodorizing and refreshing bedding, drapes and plush toys, and steam cleaning heat and moisture tolerant hard surfaces such as high chair trays and kids play surfaces as a chemical free alternative. The BLACK+DECKER Advanced Handheld Steamer puts the power of steam into a lightweight appliance for quick, everyday use, keeping your fabrics wrinkle-free and household steam fresh.

*45% more steam than the Conair GS23 Series based on 3rd party testing, July 2016.
feature_bullets: Extra Long Cord: The 15ft cord gives you plenty of reach for steaming drapes and bedding.
Auto Shutoff: After 15 minutes of inactivity the steamer will automatically power down.
Continuous Steam: Lock the steam trigger into place to release a continuous flow of steam that melts away wrinkles in no time.
Burst of Steam: Hit the steam trigger to generate a powerful burst of steam that blasts away wrinkles.
Attachments: Use the included attachments for special jobs: upholstery, delicate fabrics and lint removal.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars475 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Handheld Steamer^Removable Water Tank^Lint Remover Attachment^Delicate Fabrics Attachment^Upholstery Fabrics Attachment^HGS200 Use and Care Manual
